pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gibbs Sea Water Functions // Provides an interface to the Gibbs 'SeaWater' ('TEOS-10') C library, version 3.05 (commit '13ab33cea0e9059d3b3f3dfef78e9591c94af9f8', dated 2017-07-27, available at https://github.com/TEOS-10/GSW-C, which stems from 'Matlab' and other code written by members of Working Group 127 of 'SCOR'/'IAPSO' (Scientific Committee on Oceanic Research / International Association for the Physical Sciences of the Oceans).
